sentences.sContent: This went on until one day when I was fishing with a friend of mine at a nearby pond.
sentences.sContent_eng: This went on until one day when I was fishing with a friend of mine at a nearby pond.
sentences.sCn: 这样持续了一段时间，直到有一天，当我在我的一个朋友在附近的一个池塘钓鱼。

sentences.sContent: For those who live in this area, the field, pond and trees they can see from the site are not special but close to them.
sentences.sContent_eng: For those who live in this area, the field, pond and trees they can see from the site are not special but close to them.
sentences.sCn: 对于那些在该地区生活的人来说，能从场地看到田地、池塘和树木并不特别，但胜在距离较近。

trans.tranOther: a small area of fresh water that is smaller than a lake, that is either natural or artificially made
